title: ZYRA - sakura skin concept + particles and splash
body:
About a month ago I uploadet a sakura zyra skin concept, and it turned out that people liked the generel idea, but that they would prefer to see her in a sakura kimono (like the one Karma has) instead of her usual leaf bikini. So here is the total remake, hope you like it - constructive criticism is much appriciated :) 

Splash
http://i.imgur.com/gtlGnr2.png

Concept
http://i.imgur.com/bA94Rgf.png

Thornspitter, Vinelasher, seed and ward
http://i.imgur.com/m978zcB.png

Grasping roots
http://i.imgur.com/0FXAKrK.png

Ultimate
http://i.imgur.com/pWXaMaS.png

When recalling, Zyra dissolves into sakura petals
http://i.imgur.com/EdImTcH.png

More concepts at: http://equifox.deviantart.com/

replies.body: I love the plants! :D

Absolutely love the plants too. The blossoms on her are spot on.

Not a fan of the hair, but I DO like the braiding thrown in there. Very cool. The hair pointed upwards and the stuff going outwards near her legs was a bit much for me personally.

I would want her to look more Japanese, honestly. Also think her green in her "kimono" should be more pastel, along with her pink coloration in the dress itself.

http://www.kimono-yukata-market.com/kimono/kimono-antique/01.html

Her taunt could have a Japanese paper umbrella... just a thought.
If I could get away with giving Zyra a beautiful paper umbrella that would be so lovely! But I was a bit afraid people would think it was too off compared her stanard concept....

> [{quoted}](name=Equifox,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=OIWl3ZsH,comment-id=000500000001,timestamp=2015-03-20T09:20:16.709+0000)
>
> If I could get away with giving Zyra a beautiful paper umbrella that would be so lovely! But I was a bit afraid people would think it was too off compared her stanard concept....

Maybe as part of a taunt or joke or dance?
She could dance around with the umbrella while petals were cirkling around her... that would look really nice
I think you could easily get away with it.

I agree on the Japanese thing (there are like no Asians in this game) and on the plants, the plants are the best part.  The color palette is pretty good too.  My only complain is the outfit.  Way too much cleavage, way too short of skirt.   Just make it a standard kimono for crying out loud.  Or maybe a shorter kimono, like cut near the knees, like the male version, so she's not restricted in mobility, and some nice form fitting pants.

I also agree that the silhouette may not look very Zyra when implemented.

EDIT: If it wasnt clear, i was talking about how champs looked, not their actual ethnicity.  You should all know there is no Asia in the game.  I know that Ionia is thematically inspired by Asian culture, but no one from that region looks Asian to me.  Ahri is the only Asian-looking champ, or at least she was before her splash update.

You can continue to argue with me if you want but i dont care and wont reply as i no longer care about race representation.

> [{quoted}](name=gatchi,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=OIWl3ZsH,comment-id=000500000000,timestamp=2015-03-20T01:22:02.795+0000)
>
>  (there are like no Asians in this game)


Lee Xin, Yasuo, Xin Zhao, WuKong.... they're crying
plus all the ninjas, ahri, syndra and irelia

As long as we are being technical, The ninjas are Ionian.

Ahri is a Kumiho and therefore not human nor Asian.
Almost everyone from Ionia is Asian.

Everyone from Ionia **appears **Asian.
But they are Ionian, not actually Asian.
Cause Ionia isn't real, and Asia is.
Since that wasn't clear.

> [{quoted}](name=Jamnon,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=OIWl3ZsH,comment-id=00050000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-04-29T23:25:48.987+0000)
>
> Everyone from Ionia **appears **Asian.
> But they are Ionian, not actually Asian.
> Cause Ionia isn't real, and Asia is.
> Since that wasn't clear.

*claps*

I agree with the outfit, the sleeves are great, I feel like the skirt and top are kinda killing it, I agree with the kimono, for reference I'd say search or watch some pretty accurate movies like memoirs of a geisha where things are pretty accurate.
https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/4/48/Japan-Kyoto-Geisha.jpg https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/736x/a1/7e/1a/a17e1a8bc0dc65392b5a1230e3ce4091--yukata-kimono-kimono-dress.jpg https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/236x/59/8d/65/598d65c8c0b6ae9a0a5165115adbe929--kimono-geisha-kimono-japan.jpg
But something more like these (Still has the look but more of he kinda thing you'd see in the game and stuff) may be more suitable : 
https://ae01.alicdn.com/kf/HTB152WKLVXXXXbrXXXXq6xXFXXXd/-font-b-Red-b-font-Cherry-Blossoms-font-b-Kimono-b-font-Dresses-Halloween-Heavy.jpg
or
https://ae01.alicdn.com/kf/HTB14AN8IFXXXXaTXpXXq6xXFXXXV/Free-Shipping-Cherry-Blossoms-Women-Traditional-Japanese-Kimono-Lolita-Dress-Cosplay-Costume.jpg

Also it'd be nice to include the obi? Here's some images 
https://johnastria007.files.wordpress.com/2015/09/obi.jpg http://www.techniques-martiales.com/ressources/images_membres/25-11-10_e0463879001290643518.jpg http://tokyofashion.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/TK-2015-01-05-014-003-Harajuku.jpg http://wordpress.tokyotimes.org/archives/kimono_obi02copy.jpg
I'd post a picture of my grandmothers but currently don't have one so I hope google, books, movies, etc. will be enough.
Hopefully this happens, best of luck!

Agreed with the kimono and paper umbrella, that'd be great. The skin is absolutely stunning, definitely would buy it in a heart beat, but my issue is that it seems you are wanting a more 'Geisha' feel to it, as Jamnon said about the kimono... which is an iconic Japanese/Asian symbol and also her hair... I love the design just not the color. Not anything against brunettes (I'm one myself, though it looks more black lmao...) But the color does not seem to... fit...? Hope you understood my kinda jumbled thoughts. I hope this happens though!!!

this is one of those things that you never knew that you wanted, but now you need it.

RITO PLS

I love the plants and particle effects. The recall animation is a nice thought too. 

My only criticism is that she has so much going on between the kimono, the hair, and the sleeves that she looks too departed from her classic silhouette and almost unrecognizable as Zyra.
Agreed! Love everything else, but the kimono and hair are a little too busy!
Visually, she looks too human, but the ability/ward/recall designs are pretty sweet.
http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-qj0bRO5GTVw/U0AkuEEZ8FI/AAAAAAAAAOM/TmjzGAftqUU/s1600/SKT+Zyra.jpg

Sakura Zyra doesn't really sound like it fits, but I like the idea.
edit. The combination of these two names sounds stupid to me. That's what I meant, not that the skin doesn't fit her.

Maybe, but it just went well with the skinline that Karma started...
Cherryblossom Zyra could be a possibility too.
Wow, I can already see the tears of the team in charge of animating it.
Maybe but it'll all be worth it

YES
YES
YES
YES
YES
YES
YES

http://stream1.gifsoup.com/view4/1316918/spongebob-i-need-it-o.gif

“I NEEEEEEEEED ITTTT"

> [{quoted}](name=Kamiroo Wolf,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=OIWl3ZsH,comment-id=0013,timestamp=2015-03-20T03:20:04.792+0000)
>
> http://stream1.gifsoup.com/view4/1316918/spongebob-i-need-it-o.gif
> 
> “I NEEEEEEEEED ITTTT"

"No! Spongebob! No! STOOOOOOOP! PINKY! PINKY!"

Would Absolutely Die For This Skin.
Kill me Now.
I don't like Zyra. But I would buy her just to own this skin and actually learn how to play her so I could use it and not get wrecked. Well done.

I love it, she's need some color in her skins (Red/green, brown, red/fire, human skin). I suggested to Riot Penguin on his stream a Rainforest/River Spirit themed skin akin to the colorful Nami skin but he shot it down :(

Thank you :)
For a plantlady she really lacks color in her skins. Maybe a flower-skin will get a chance next spring
Day 1 buy. No questions asked.

This could be a possible new Legendary skin, or if you go further and make a skin for each season, an ultimate skin. Imagine toggling between the 4 seasons, kinda like DJ Sona switching tracks, but instead of changing the music, what if it changed the ambiance? Spring = Birds chirping, Summer = idk a summer breeze?, Fall = crackling leaves, Winter = a howling snowstorm?

Just thought I'd put this out there.

With this idea this post gave me we'd be closer to having an Ultimate skin team.
{{champion:81}}  - ADC
{{champion:77}}  - Jungle
{{champion:37}}  - Support
{{champion:143}}  - Mid

Now I just gotta find a Top laner. XD

That could be amazing! 

Beautiful red and brown leaves in Autumn
Crystal-like clothing and iceflowers in winther 
Strong green colours in summer
This sounds like a great idea. needs to be done. no arguments excepted
Too good to be true. Riot will find a way to make her look more... "Zyra"
Leave the work for riot? Sounds like a good plan to me ;)

instead of it being cherry blossom like the name of the skin why can it be an order of the lotus skin 030 I know riot don't like to exactly copy an artwork from someone, they like to make one of there own sooo maybe it will be an order of the lotus skin
Riot pls. Moar Zyra skins.
Fucking Hell, I didn't even know I needed this but I NEED IT.
im late but i love it ♥.♥
More Zyra skins pls pls pls!!
This to be could also be a order of the lotus {{champion:143}}  skin!
pls do make this a skin
I want this skin so bad! OMG!!!
i want thissssss
i personally think a championship zyra skin would be great we already have enough skins with this color {{champion:143}}
This is a neat idea! I was actually going to draft up an order of the lotus zyra a week or so ago but this might be a better idea :D
WANT
I freaking love the idea, Zyra being my main, I would insta but it !
